verses.verse: In the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> in the sixth <S%H8345><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> in the first <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel, <S%H7597><s%> governor <S%H6346><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josedech, <S%H3087><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> speaketh <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> The time <S%H6256><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> the time <S%H6256><s%> that the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> should be built. <S%H1129><s%>
Then came <S%H1961><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
Is it time <S%H6256><s%> for you, O ye, <S%H859><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in your ceiled <S%H5603><s%> houses, <S%H1004><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> lie waste? <S%H2720><s%>
Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> Consider <S%H7760><s%> <S%H3824><s%> <S%H5921><s%> your ways. <S%H1870><s%>

Ye have sown <S%H2232><s%> much, <S%H7235><s%> and bring in <S%H935><s%> little; <S%H4592><s%> ye eat, <S%H398><s%> but ye have not enough; <S%H369><s%> <S%H7646><s%> ye drink, <S%H8354><s%> but ye are not filled with drink; <S%H369><s%> <S%H7937><s%> ye clothe <S%H3847><s%> you, but there is none warm; <S%H369><s%> <S%H2552><s%> and he that earneth wages <S%H7936><s%> earneth wages <S%H7936><s%> to put it into <S%H413><s%> a bag <S%H6872><s%> with holes. <S%H5344><s%>
Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> Consider <S%H7760><s%> <S%H3824><s%> <S%H5921><s%> your ways. <S%H1870><s%>

Go up <S%H5927><s%> to the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and build <S%H1129><s%> the house; <S%H1004><s%> and I will take pleasure <S%H7521><s%> in it, and I will be glorified, <S%H3513><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Ye looked <S%H6437><s%> for <S%H413><s%> much, <S%H7235><s%> and, lo, <S%H2009><s%> it came to little; <S%H4592><s%> and when ye brought <S%H935><s%> it home, <S%H1004><s%> I did blow <S%H5301><s%> upon it. Why? <S%H3282><s%> <S%H4100><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> of mine house <S%H1004><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is waste, <S%H2720><s%> and ye <S%H859><s%> run <S%H7323><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> unto his own house. <S%H1004><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you is stayed <S%H3607><s%> from dew, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2919><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> is stayed <S%H3607><s%> from her fruit. <S%H2981><s%>

And I called <S%H7121><s%> for a drought <S%H2721><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the corn, <S%H1715><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the new wine, <S%H8492><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the oil, <S%H3323><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%> bringeth forth, <S%H3318><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> men, <S%H120><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> cattle, <S%H929><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the labor <S%H3018><s%> of the hands. <S%H3709><s%>

Then Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel, <S%H7597><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josedech, <S%H3087><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> obeyed <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> and the words <S%H1697><s%> of Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> had sent <S%H7971><s%> him, and the people <S%H5971><s%> did fear <S%H3372><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Then spoke <S%H559><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> messenger <S%H4397><s%> in the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> message <S%H4400><s%> unto the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am with <S%H854><s%> you, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> stirred up <S%H5782><s%> <S%H853><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel, <S%H7597><s%> governor <S%H6346><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josedech, <S%H3087><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the people; <S%H5971><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%>

In the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the sixth <S%H8345><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the king. <S%H4428><s%>
